terrainTypes.name: Difficult Terrain
terrainTypes.effect: Moving through these areas costs double the normal movement.

terrainTypes.name: Unstable Ground
terrainTypes.effect: Any character who takes damage or moves quickly must make an Agility check or be knocked Prone.

coverTypes.name: Light Cover
coverTypes.effect: You gain a +2 bonus to your defense against ranged attacks.

coverTypes.name: Heavy Cover
coverTypes.effect: You gain a +5 bonus to your defense against ranged attacks.

coverTypes.name: Full Cover
coverTypes.effect: You cannot be targeted by attacks that require line of sight.

environmentalConditions.name: Obscured Area
environmentalConditions.effect: Creatures within are effectively Blinded when trying to see outside.

environmentalConditions.name: High Ground
environmentalConditions.effect: You gain a bonus to your ranged attack rolls against targets at a lower elevation.
